Travelling is among many other things which come eventually in a life. But travel with safety is never so prominent because it is like less considerable topic. But my take on safety is very clear. If any Car Rental service provider is not providing vehicle according to safety measures there is no point of going with such service providers. Safety is unlikely is very important for both the Car Rental service provider and the traveler. When someone decides to travel, it brings a lot of things into one’s mind. Travelling in itself is a very exhausting activity but when you put everything in a queue viz., picking the right Online Cab Booing service provider, chooses the vehicle according to your destination and type of visit you are planning it is like eating a pie. Because when destination is in the position to decide everything mainly what kind of road you get crossed, then safety becomes like more than anything. When I Book a Cab with a trusted taxi services provider for my second tour, unfortunately I met with one of the worst case scenario but they are so helpful that I immediately came out as a fresh leaf. So I decided to enlist some of my points one should consider before Renting a Car with any Car rental service provider you like. 
Know Your Tour: First thing one must understand is about the nature of your tour. It is because, for each kind of tour/travel there is a particular kind of plan or scheme which car rental companies are providing that must matches with the type of vehicle you ask for. This is so because if anyone is on corporate or business trip then you must ask for Luxury Car but at the same time if you are planning to travel across the outskirt of any landscape then only Luxury car in not enough. 
Know your road: When you are planning your trip then you must know each and every road you are getting across while travelling. Before Booking a Cab if you don’t understand what type of road is coming across in your way then must not understand what type of vehicle is apt for your tour. And wrong selection of vehicle sometimes proved like a bump across the road or sometime it proves fatal or unfortunate, which ultimately ruins the trip. So closely understand your tour. 
Know every safety features of your vehicle: If you are booking a Cab of your own choice then you must understand your vehicle and must know all its safety features because at the time of any mishap if you are well informed about your vehicle then you can probably avoid any messy situation. 
Know your destination and its Traffic rules: If you are completely informed about the destination and traffic rules then you do not stuck in traffic or lost in between. While travelling through foreign land it is a fair chance to get struck in any unfortunate incident so do your research about your travelling destination.
